name: WMI Persistence - Command Line Event Consumer
description: Detects WMI command line event consumers
false_positives: Unknown (data set is too small; further testing needed)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\WmiPrvSE.exe AND file.path:*\\wbemcons.dll)`
